body:
I have decided later down the road in a few months that I will buy a good gaming laptop because I have quite an old mouse and computor.
since I know nothing about good gaming laptops do you guys have any ideas under 1200$?
body_tagged:
I have decided later down the road in a few months that I will buy a good gaming laptop because I have quite an old mouse and computor.
since I know nothing about good gaming laptops do you guys have any ideas under 1200$?
title: Hey Lads

replies.body: I've heard that's better than almost i7 computers :P
replies.body_tagged: I've heard that's better than almost i7 computers :P

replies.body: Thanks, I think I'm gonna go with the Barbie one. Looks great and very affordable...
replies.body_tagged: Thanks, I think I'm gonna go with the Barbie one. Looks great and very affordable...

replies.body: It is. I've been using it for a while now. Pretty good. Gets me 300+ FPS for MC, runs BF4 on over 60 frames, unbeatable for the price. The exterior design is just an added bonus. I love the pink and purple tones. Essentially I would recommend this to anyone new or experienced in PC gaming.
replies.body_tagged: It is. I've been using it for a while now. Pretty good. Gets me 300+ FPS for MC, runs BF4 on over 60 frames, unbeatable for the price. The exterior design is just an added bonus. I love the pink and purple tones. Essentially I would recommend this to anyone new or experienced in PC gaming.

replies.body: Sounds great but does it have hyper threading, water cooling and 4k support? If it does then its a big barbie bargain, revolutionary.
